about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME

🎮 Welcome to LostMagic – a role-playing game inspired by the classics of the genre, where magic no longer reigns, and those who dream of restoring it must fight for their cause. This is a world where people from Earth arrived in search of the last drop of magical energy—only to discover new mysteries, ancient threats, and the struggle for survival.

🔍 Explore a mysterious world filled with intrigue and unexpected encounters. Join secret organizations, solve riddles, and hunt for rare Easter eggs 🎭 hidden in the most unexpected places. Here, every choice has consequences, and knowledge is power 📖✨.

TACTICAL BATTLES AND DEADLY ENEMIES

🔥 The LostMagic combat system is designed for true strategists. Turn-based battles require a thoughtful approach—use unique abilities ⚡, combine talents, analyze enemy weaknesses, and find vulnerabilities 🎯 to gain the upper hand, even in the most challenging fights.

👹 But the real trials await you in boss fights. Gigantic demons 😈, ancient artifact-bound entities 🔮, and mechanical titans 🤖—each boss requires a unique strategy. Defeating them grants legendary rewards 🏆, but to triumph, you must rely not only on strength but also on cunning 🧠.

DUNGEONS, PVP, AND THE "TOWER OF ARCANA"

⚔️ Venture into dark dungeons—alone or with a group. Every labyrinth holds its own secrets and deadly traps ☠️, and in its depths, powerful bosses and treasures 💎 await. For those who enjoy battling other players, PvP arenas are open, where you can test your skills in team fights 🏅. And in the Tower of Arcana, you’ll start with no equipment and must find different ways to emerge victorious—only your skill determines the outcome.

A WORLD FULL OF MYSTERIES AND POSSIBILITIES

🔮 Unravel the secrets of the nameless City by penetrating its Inside Out. Challenge the Shaved Sisters gang or become a paladin of the Last Order. Become a warrior of the Swamp Legion or set out to explore Zone 51 👽. Discover what lies hidden within the Confluxion and find your way through space and time in star sneakers.

There’s always something to do in LostMagic—explore, fight, solve mysteries, and become part of a great story!
detailed_description:
✨ LostMagic Update: Bug Fixes, Improvements & Exciting Changes Ahead! 🔮

🔮 Hey everyone! Thank you for your active feedback – we carefully read all your comments and suggestions, and it's because of you that LostMagic keeps getting better with every update!

⚒️ What’s new?

- We’ve fixed multiple bugs to make the game more stable and enjoyable for all players.

- Added a location map to help you more easily navigate the world that has lost its magic!

- Faction restrictions in the Arcane Tower have been removed – groups are now formed solely based on player levels: 9-12, 13-16, 17-19, 20+. This change will help you take on challenges more easily

- You can now discard unnecessary quest items if the associated quest is not in your journal – no more cluttered inventory!

- System messages that previously might have appeared in the wrong language will now be displayed in the selected language.

✨ What’s next?

We’re already working on new updates with exciting improvements and content. Stay tuned to be the first to know about upcoming changes!

💬 Share your thoughts, let us know what you love and what could be improved – your feedback truly matters to us!
